item.title: Update global message? 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @hybridpker hybridpker
item.description:
@hybridpker wrote:

Since my players have been complaining because they’ve lost items when I do my restarts, I wanted to add this warning message but I did something completely wrong I believe and I get an error. Maybe it’s possible to save everybodys file just before the server goes off or something?

} if (command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7) && (playerRights >= 3)) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command .substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); talk("WARNING: Logout before update time expires to prevent item loss!); } }

Read full topic
